mapper.sql: id, center_id, session_code, course_type, start_date, end_date, expected_students, status, notes, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT FROM session ORDER BY session_code DESC
SELECT FROM session WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY session_code DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO session (center_id, session_code, course_type, start_date, end_date, expected_students, status, notes, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{centerId}, #{sessionCode}, #{courseType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{expectedStudents}, #{status}, #{notes}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE session SET center_id = #{centerId}, session_code = #{sessionCode}, course_type = #{courseType}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, expected_students = #{expectedStudents}, status = #{status}, notes = #{notes}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
